website_summaries.verdict: Individuals looking for a pair of lightweight yet well-performing approach shoes can find great satisfaction in the Konseal FL from Arc’teryx. These low-top kicks are also deserving of much praise, thanks to its awesome cushioning, sensitivity, and breathability. The shoe's advantages, however, are somewhat marred by its few shortcomings. Nevertheless, there is a big chance that outdoorsy folks will appreciate the Konseal FL deeply, what with all its approach-centric pros.
pros: Based on a ton of user reviews, the Arc'teryx Konseal FL shoe provides a high level of comfort
The sticky sole of this comfy pair of approach shoes is praiseworthy to droves of outdoor lovers
Many are delighted with the seamless upper construction of this hiker
The Konseal FL’s barely-there feel is impressive to a considerable number of owners
Some pleased hikers state that this Arc’teryx product gives reliable performance in both climbing and hiking adventures
It provides a good degree of cushioning overall, according to a handful of testers
More than a dozen critics are surprised with the Konseal FL's abrasion-resistant upper
Most buyers testify to its breathability
cons: A product reviewer comments that he dislikes the Konseal FL’s thin laces
He added that they are a pain to tie, especially with cold hands
It lacks arch support, a few experts say
Someone who tests footwear for a living finds the shoe lacking in the stability department

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I spit of everything I liked about this shoe, the light weight, the stability, the minimalist styling, I was forced to return it because of an issue with the tongue and the lacing creating pressure points on the tops of my feet when they are flexed. The combination of a too thin tongue and a thin round lace vs. say, a flat lace profile and more padding, means that when these are tightened sufficient to hold my foot securely, tension is not delivered evenly enough to provide workable comfort. Unfortunately another example of Arc’teryx self defeating spartanesc super light models.
customer_reviews.author: John Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes. I wanted something lighter than my Keen Targhees for lighter trails and just walking around. These fit the bill. I'm a 10 regular and they fit perfectly, not too narrow. After an hour or two of wearing in the house, they felt perfectly comfortable. Went hiking the next day and they performed admirably. The trouble is, they're so sleek and good looking you don't want to get them dirty. They seem like they'd be good travel shoes. If we ever get to travel again...
customer_reviews.author: Manny Mack

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: Just climbed yesterday to the saddle of the Grand Teton (and back) in these having only had them 3 weeks. Scree, bouldering, rock climbing, and trail. Over 5000 vert in one day. My feet are the only part of me not sore. Can I give 6 stars?
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: A bit narrow
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit nice however I have wider feet and the pinky toe rubs a little. Maybe once they are broke in this will go away. I still love the shoes. They grip almost every surface.
customer_reviews.author: Sonita

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoe for street hiking
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit my narrow feet very well. The sizing was just right. This is one of the more comfortable pairs of shoes I have worn in quite a while. They appear to be very well-made.
customer_reviews.author: RzR

customer_reviews.title: 2 days old
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 10 and these fit perfectly. Very nice looking in carbon blue. Water proof, have already hiked in the snow with rhem and right out of the box they performed. Dry and awesome traction!
customer_reviews.author: Assured22

customer_reviews.title: A five all the way
customer_reviews.text: Using these approach shoes in the Southwest, correct fit for fast and light approaches. Lacing system very nice and comfortable. Very good stability and absorbs jolts.
customer_reviews.author: SLD

customer_reviews.title: great shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these shoes. my first ones lasted about 18 months. Well made for hiking, walking, day to day activities. very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: A little expensive, however, worth it.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are high quality and fit great. I will definitely buy additional pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great Hiking shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, would recommend. Hiked 4 hours and my feet were comfortable. Stylish, lightweight and a great deal on Amazon. Absolutely great shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Arcteryx Men's Konseal FL Shoe
feature_bullets: Outer Material: 3D molded rubber toe cap, Vibram Megagrip
